Articles.Content: Hello guys, and considering the fact that you now get random crewmembers, I haven\'t got Jeb in a while. Is he still as criminally insane as he used to be? Or did they tone it down? I\'m saying this because all of the Kerbals seem to act the same now, but then again, as I just said, I haven\'t had Jeb in a while.

Bob, Jeb and Bill are the very first kerbals you get in a fresh install, the only way of getting them into a ship other than the first is safely returning back to kerbin (ending the flight) and NOT crashing. Other pilots are randomly generated.
Though if they die, they come back on their own after a while.
They do? Hm, never noticed that. Maybe because my only notable crew (besides the original three, which are landed safely on the Mun) is one little kerbal which I try to return safely at all times.

Wait, what? If they\'re landed on the Mun, then you definitely can\'t get them back until after they\'ve either returned, or died and some time has passed.

Edit: Sorry, thought you were OP. Since you\'re not, I guess you already knew the above.

In any case, Jebediah still smiles most of the time.
